roleset.name: overtake

example.name: in passing
example.text: SAw the punch in passing , looked a decent one - two .

example.name: Both args
example.text: I think his passing her in the stair-well is simply him not knowing what to do with a distraught woman

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on pass-n.01, pass-v.02. No VNcls.

roleset.name: die
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on on499-nouns-be.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Zemin Jiang , president of the People 's Republic of China , and Peng Li , premier of the State Council , sent a telegraph of condolences on the 23rd on the passing of former US President , Richard Nixon .
example.arg: of former US President, Richard Nixon

roleset.name: bill becomes law
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on on499-nouns-be.

example.name: arg1
example.text: On 14 February , in a statement in which he spoke of a " painful choice " and his " undying determination , " Premier Chang Chun - hsiung announced the resumption of work on the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant , and identified the passing of a plebiscite law as the most important topic for renewed cross-party consultation .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: But the alertness of the road guards prevented the passing of this quantity on to our youth .
